name: A Duck On Wheels Part 3: Duck Race 3000
name_original: A Duck On Wheels Part 3: Duck Race 3000
description:
A Duck on Wheels Part 3: Duck Race 3000

This game is my entry for the third round of GDKO 2023. 

The task this time around was to create a boss battle so, when I thought about what type of boss battle a duck on wheels would have, the obvious answer was to have a race. 

For this one, I also decided to create the art assets since its something I haven't had much of a chance to do lately.

I hope you enjoy it :)

Controls

Left Arrow - Move left

Right Arrow - Move right

Space - Jump

Up Arrow - Interact

Music

"Rollin at 5" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
